attributes.action: Change the legal driving age to 16
attributes.background: I want the government to acknowledge that public transport is useless for teenagers trying to get their education and that we can be just as responsible if not more then 17 year olds.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do it as I and so many others struggle to get to school and hate having to ask my parents to take me to meet up with friends, with the changing of the this law, less stress will be put on parents and we can get to school quickly, further helping our education.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598776
